    • Method Detail

      • getParser

        public static final TextParser getParser(TextParserConfiguration cfg,
                   java.lang.String parserClassName,
                   java.lang.ClassLoader parserClassLoader)
        Creates data parser according to the configuration and data type. The fastes parser implementation is used. Each TextParser implementation must have method getParserSpeed. This method returns null value if parser can't parse specified configuration, otherwise return parser speed as integer 0(slowest)-100(fastest).
        Parameters:
        cfg - requested parser configuration
        parserClassName - parser class name
        parserClassLoader - Class loader of the parser. Can be null (in this case current class loader is used).
        Returns:
        fastest parse implemementation, always is not null
        Throws:
        JetelRuntimeException - if no parser found

      • getParser
